page.title: 08EDUCATION (Continued).
page.content: {Sele School Outdoors} On the yard there are games painted, such as a snake and two hopscotches. There are four drains.We play British Chasey and people bring toys out to play with.British is a game where someone is picked to be on.He or she goes and stands about a yard away from the rest of the people.they go and stand on a line which is near the top of the yard.The children yell the person who's on's name and then he picks somebody.They then run down to the other side of the yard.The person who's on has to catch the person who ran down.If he's caught,he picks someone and the game goes on.If he gets across,everybody else runs down and tries to get across.
